main event: Unidentified aerial phenomena were observed in the Morgantown, West Virginia area in 1962.
interesting points: The objects were described as circular and dark, with a yellow glow around them that had a glinting effect, indicating they were turning at a high rate of speed.
The objects were reported to be moving at a speed of around 200 mph in a formation.
The report mentions that the observation was made in the air force area.
The objects were observed for an extended period of time and were described as having a peculiar motion.
The report notes that the speed and direction of movement were not reported in the original report, and that the conclusion was that there was insufficient data.
sighted object: circular, dark objects with a yellow glow
